metadata.title: Funfash Plus Size Women Slimming A Line Empire Waist Top Blouse Shirt Made USA
features: 92% Poly | 8% Spandex : Our fabrics are highly valued for their outstanding features like tear resistance, comfort to wear, soft texture, mesmerizing design, and vivacious coloring effect.
Made in USA: USA is the country of manufacture for this premium garment. The workmanship is of the highest Funfash Fashion quality standard and was created by skilled hands!
Drawstring Closure: Drawstrings are the ideal traditional closure. To give a defined bust, you can tighten the string or pull it closer. This black blouse will quickly become a favorite.
Recommended Care: This plus size short sleeve sexy tops must be hand-washed or cleaned on a gentle cycle with cold water to maintain its optimum quality as it ages.
Empire Waist Tunic Top : Our topÂ in which the blouse has a tight bodice that ends just below the bust, giving the appearance of being high waisted, and a long, loosely fitting, gathered skirt.
Fashion: This plus size dressy casual top is perfect with leggings, skinny jeans, shorts, trousers, jackets, cardigans, sweaters, and more. It makes you appear fashionably beautiful, chic, and sexy.
description: Designed with curves in mind... in the USA!
This top was designed to give you confidence and makes you feel beautiful!
The shirt is sexy, cute, slimming and comfortable. A great fitting top! The length goes just slightly past the butt, hiding and accentuating all the right areas.
This may become your favorite piece of clothing. Hides large arms, defines the waist, showcases cleavage. Great for curvy busty girls who want to hide the fluffy midriff.
Its also soooo easy to care for and pack for trips. We recommend washing gently in cold water with like colors or dry clean.
Super well made, just like you ;)
Designed to be most flattering for customers with cup size up to DD. If your cup size is over DD, we recommend going up a size.
